0.9.9.name: wordpress/wikipress
0.9.9.description:
WikiPress is a simple solution for collaborating with other users in the administration section of your WordPress installation.

WikiPress allows you to:

  • Create a new wiki

  • Edit existing wikis

  • Choose the option of archiving your edits

  • Track the username, date & time of archived wikis

  • Use simple BBCode inside of your wiki

  • Quickly add a new wiki using "QuickiPress"

NOTE: A Wiki cannot be inserted into a post and/or page as of right now. That feature is scheduled to be released with the next update.
